HDG.LOG.content: logos: Being of beings > [on technology] forgotten lightning-flash of Being emerges as that alone which is worthy of thought [Being of beings has been safeguarded, the beginning of its destiny in Greek thought, still governs modern technology]

HDG.IM.content: adding “instead of nothing” prevents beginning directly w/ beings as unquestionably given [?] > forfeit the self-evidence of beings > cannot wholly belong to any thing, not even ourselves ([still] Da-sein “in each case mine”) > in this question, beings come to waver (btwn Being and not-Being), questioning loses secure foothold, Dasein comes into suspense, maintains itself in suspense [what kind of maintenance is this?]

HDG.BC.content: no timeless rule in meleta to pan, remembering what is incipient and deciding what is yet to come, must single out the Greek thought as 1st beginning, but not as a rule [how is this distinction made?]

HDG.TB.content: [Augustine] beginning of Western thinking, Being is thought, not as “It gives” as such, latter withdraws in favor of gift which it gives > giving which gives only its gift, in giving holds itself back and withdraws, such a giving we call sending [lookup] > Being—that which It gives—is what is sent [other names for Being]

HDG.QB.content: by no means easier to say “being” than to speak of the nothing > shows how once more, inevitably, everything depends (ankommt) on correct saying (rechte Sagen), the logos whose essence logic/dialectic of metaphysics can never experience > is it due to “being” (as Same) that our saying fails? all too readily suspected as so-called “mysticism”? > [beyond Being, Derrida] would the crossing of the line leave language of fundamental words to whim of those who are speaking? enough for language to be universally comprehensible? or do other [uniquely unique] laws/measures prevail here [totally other]? (these questions are scarcely beginning to become worthy of question—to feel home in them)

HDG.FS.content: since history of metaphysics presents history of concealment of being, we can now think history of being itself and make a beginning w/next step: taking-into-view being as being

HDG.FS.content: experience of instancy in clearing of Being, only possible through detour (Umweg) of return to beginning > return occurs in echo of Parmenides, the hearing that opens in our present age (epoch of sending [Schickung] of being as Ge-stell)

HDG.FS.content: there is a return to beginning in Being and Time, but it is through destruction, dismantling, disintegration (Auflösung) (which is sometimes awkward [ungeschickt] [?]) of what is destined as being in metaphysics > not yet in Being and Time a genuine knowledge of history of being, hence the awkwardness, naiveté of “ontological destruction” > since then, unavoidable naiveté of novice gave way to a knowing [he arrived, no more destruction?]

HDG.DL.content: thinking look (Anleitung) into Sage only beginning of path that takes us back out (zürucknimmt) of metaphysical representations in das Achten auf die Winke jener Botschaft, deren Botengänger wir eigens werden möchten [in the attention/heeding of hints, traces, whose message we would want to properly bear?]

HDG.LP.content: [2 kinds of “a dead”] Elis doesn’t decay/cease to be, he moves away into earliness > “stranger unfolds human nature forward into the beginning” of what has not yet come to be carried (Tragen, giberan) > Trakl calls this quieter/stilling element: the unborn (Ungeborene) > “something strange” = “something unborn”

HDG.LP.content: gold, truth, rightness > [death] earliness in which stranger has expired (verstorben), shelters the Wesensgerechte of the unborn > the end (Ende) not sequel (Folge) of beginning, its the end of decaying Geschlechtes, thus precedes (vorauf) beginning of unborn Geschlechtes: as earlier earliness, has already overtaken the end

HDG.LP.content: “softly (leise)” always leads us softly to essential relations (wesenhaften Bezüge) > pain conceals itself in stone (petrifying pain) > silent glow of 1st dawn (earliest, ancient origin [uralte Herkunft]), the prior beginning coming toward everything that is becoming (Werdende), brings it to the never-to-be-obtained arrival [the never-arriving arrival] (nie einholbare Ankunft) of its essential being

HDG.LP.content: apartness is active (west) as pure spirit, radiance of blue, kindles (entflammt) a stiller childhood into the gold of 1st beginning > Elis turns his golden countenance toward this earliness, his Gegenblick keeps/guards (wahrt) nocturnal flame of spirit of apartness [what hermeneutic circle names superficially, attention]

HDG.EC.content: devastation concerns our own essence in a way we’re just beginning to presage (ahnen) [proximity to presupposition]
HDG.EC.linkedContent: devastation concerns our own essence in a way we’re just beginning to presage (ahnen) [proximity to presupposition]

HDG.EC.content: this is all so simple & full of mystery, how could you know all this with such clarity since this morning? > in the simple experience (einfachen Erfahrung) of the coming, as that upon which we wait, what is healing draws near (naht), is granted (geworden) to us [so the experience is already the arrival?] > you say “to us” but it was only granted to you > I would like to share it now w/ you > my experience allows me to name for the you the wound beginning to heal, I was allowed/learned to presage (ahnen) [so priestly all this]

HDG.OHF.content: something that is there for us in the being-there of everdayness has forfeited (eingebüsst) authentic character of its there, now lingers in indifference of something we can ascertain > this ascertainability (Festsellbarkeit): not its being, but possibility of its being-an-object > in contrast: disclosedness of what has significance shows the something there in How of its Dasein [Heidegger follows this w/ condensed summary, beginning w/ “From out of…”]
